verses.verse: And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>Behold<s%>, I have hearkened unto your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that ye <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4427>me<s%>, and have made a king over <S%H4428>you<s%>.

And <S%H4428>now<s%>, behold, the king <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2204>you<s%>; and I am old and <S%H7867>grayheaded<s%>; <S%H1121>and<s%>, behold, my sons are with <S%H1980>you<s%>: and I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> you from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Here I <S%H6030>am<s%>: witness against me before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and before his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>: whose <S%H7794>ox<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%>? or whose <S%H2543>ass<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%>? or whom have I <S%H6231>defrauded<s%>? whom have I <S%H7533>oppressed<s%>? or of whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> have I taken a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> to <S%H5956>blind<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7725>therewith<s%>? and I will restore it you.
And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou hast not <S%H6231>defrauded<s%> <S%H7533>us<s%>, nor oppressed <S%H3947>us<s%>, neither hast thou taken <S%H3972>aught<s%> of any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, Jehovah is <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H4899>you<s%>, and his anointed is <S%H5707>witness<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that ye have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3972>aught<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And they <S%H559>said<s%>, He is <S%H5707>witness<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, It is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H6213>appointed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and that <S%H5927>brought<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Now therefore stand <S%H3320>still<s%>, that I may <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning all the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he <S%H6213>did<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

When <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, who brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and made them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

But they <S%H7911>forgat<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>; and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and they fought against <S%H3898>them<s%>.

And they <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, because we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>: but now <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and we will serve <S%H5647>thee<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, and <S%H917>Bedan<s%>, and <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>; and ye <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>.

And when ye <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H559>you<s%>, ye said unto <S%H4428>me<s%>, Nay, but a king shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3068>us<s%>; when Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%> was your <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Now therefore behold the <S%H4428>king<s%> whom ye have <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and whom ye have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H3068>for<s%>: and, behold, Jehovah hath <S%H5414>set<s%> a king over <S%H4428>you<s%>.

If ye will <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H8085>him<s%>, and hearken unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and not <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and both ye and also the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H4427>reigneth<s%> over you be <S%H310>followers<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, well:

but if ye will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, then will the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be against <S%H1>you<s%>, as it was against your fathers.
Now <S%H1571>therefore<s%> <S%H3320>stand<s%> still and <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Is it not <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>? I will <S%H7121>call<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that he may <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>, which ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in <S%H7592>asking<s%> you a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, that we <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3254>not<s%>; for we have added unto all our <S%H2403>sins<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to <S%H7592>ask<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H6213>not<s%>; ye have indeed done all this <S%H7451>evil<s%>; yet turn not <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>:
and turn ye not <S%H5493>aside<s%>; for then would ye go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8414>vain<s%> things which cannot <S%H3276>profit<s%> nor <S%H5337>deliver<s%>, for they are <S%H8414>vain<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will not <S%H5203>forsake<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> for his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2974>sake<s%>, because it hath pleased <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> you a people unto <S%H5971>himself<s%>.

Moreover as for <S%H595>me<s%>, <S%H2486>far<s%> be it from me that I should <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H2308>ceasing<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H3384>you<s%>: but I will instruct you in the <S%H2896>good<s%> and the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Only <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him in <S%H571>truth<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for <S%H7200>consider<s%> how great things he hath done for <S%H1431>you<s%>.
But if ye shall <S%H7489>still<s%> do <S%H7489>wickedly<s%>, ye shall be <S%H5595>consumed<s%>, both ye and your <S%H4428>king<s%>.
